title: BRIEF-Orbite Technologies Provides Update On Repair Of Calcination Equipment At Cap-Chat Plant
text:
March 29, 2018 / 6:11 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Orbite Technologies Provides Update On Repair Of Calcination Equipment At Cap-Chat Plant Reuters Staff 
March 29 (Reuters) - Orbite Technologies Inc: * ORBITE PROVIDES CORPORATE UPDATE 
* UPDATE ON CONTINUING EFFORTS TO REPAIR CALCINATION EQUIPMENT AT CAP-CHAT PLANT AND TO EMERGE FROM INSOLVENCY PROTECTION 
* ‚Äç45 EMPLOYEES, INCLUDING UPPER MANAGEMENT, ARE AFFECTED BY COST-CUTTING MEASURES; MOST OF THEM WILL BE TEMPORARILY LAID-OFF 
* SMALL GROUP OF EMPLOYEES WILL REMAIN WITH REDUCED WORK HOURS TO MAINTAIN CONTINUITY OF OPERATIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
